resources.string:
Don\'t have a CodeHuntBL account?
REGISTER NOW
Get to know Banja Luka with CodeHuntBL!

It doesn\'t matter if you are a tourist or a citizen od Banja Luka, you\'ll get to visit the famous location, learn many interesting historical facts and make your stay better in a city on the river Vrbas.

Students of Electrical Engeenering in Banja Luka have made possible for you to learn a lot of interesting things while touring the city which will make your stay in our city unforgettable. Find QR codes, answer the questions and learn the particulars that make our city great.
Your username is now displayed on the rank list
Your username is not now displayed on the rank list

Read the instructions and start searching for the QR code at the required location. Once you have found the QR code, scan it and show your knowledge about the city of Banja Luka. We have also prepared two hints for you, which will associate you with the answer, but which will deprive you of points in case of use. Repeat the above steps, get to know Banja Luka and compete with your fellow citizens and tourists of our city. Good luck!!!
